property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: When Starving Artist would be drivein insane, draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: Exhaust Moon Worshiper to choose and restore a ] character that was just made insane.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a card is discarded from a players hand, Quixotic Poet gains an icon of your choice until the end of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: After you win a @ or an $ struggle at a story to which Brother of the Black Lotus is committed, ready or restore a character, if able.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Drive Starry-Eyed Adherent insane to reveal a card at random from on opponent's hand. If it is a support card, sacrifice Starry-Eyed Adherent to put that support into play under your control.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After and Artist character enters play, choose and discard a card from your handto have your opponent discard a card at random from his hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a character is restored, pay 2 to choose and wound it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Drive Unhinged Laborer insane to choose and return a support card to its owner's hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Demented Composer is readied from the effects of a $ struggle, either refresh a domain, or drive Demented Composer insane to ready all your domains. Limit once per turn.

property.name: Subtypes
property.value: Artist. Lunatic.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Artist characters gain Toughness + 1 and +1 skill.
 Action: Drive a character insane to choose a Madness card in your discard pile and put it into your hand. Limit once per phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Night. It is Night. After Mad Maudlin comes into play, destroy all Day cards.
 Opponents must drive a character insane to resource a card, if able.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: Well-Adjusted Sociopath

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a Madness card is played, drive Tom O'Bedlam insane to choose and wound a non-Ancient One character.

property.value: Cultist. Lunatic.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: Bringer of Music

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Drive Erich Zann insane to choose an opponent's non-Ancient One character. Trigger that character's ability as if you were its controller, ignoring all costs.

property.value: Artist. Lunatic.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: A Unique Perspective

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Benjamin Herriot enters play insane.
 Response: After Benjamin Herroit is restored, ready him to draw 3 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: Pay X to cancel an opponent's card effect just triggered. X is the printed cost of that card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: After you win a @ struggle at a story to which A Scheme of Byakhees is committed, the losing player must either discard a card from his hand or drive insane a character he controls.

property.value: Villianous. Invulnerability.

property.name: Card Text

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Drive 1 or more Artist characters insane to reduce the cost to play Tru'numbra by 1 each.
 While Tru'numbra is committed to a story, you win all @ struggles at that story.

property.value: Ancient One.

property.name: Keyword
property.value: Villianous. Invulnerability. Fast.

property.value: He Who Is Not To Be Named

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Lower the cost to play Hastur by 1 for each insane character in play.
 When you win a @ struggle, place a success token on that story.

property.value:
Attach to a character.
 # struggles at the story to which the attached character is comitted are resolved using @ icons instead.

property.value: Illuminated Labrynth

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
You may choose to not refresh Catacombs de Paris during your refresh phase.
 Response: After an opponent's character is destroyed exhaust Catacombs de Paris to put that character into play insane under your control. While Catacombs de Paris is exhausted that character remains under your control.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Attach to a ] character.
 If attached character goes insane do not discard Fregoli Delusion.
 Disrupt: Before a story struggle is resolved at a story, exhaust attached character to commit it to that story.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: Holding back the Tides

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
The first character that enters play each turn enters play insane.
 Action pay 2 and sacrifice the Dikes of Ys to choose and destroy a support card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Attach to a non-Ancient One character.
Forced Response: After your turn begins, place a success token on Unspeakable Promise. If Unspeakable Promise has X or more success tokens on it, take control of attached character. X is the printed cost of that character.

property.value: Condition. Attachment.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Forced Response: After an opponent loses a @ struggle, place a success token on Drawing the Sign.
 Action: If Drawing the Sign has 8 success tokens on it, sacrifice it and choose a story. You win that story.

property.value: Tainted and Twisted

property.name: Card Text

 After Forbidden Sutra leaves play, shuffle it into it's owner's deck.
 Disrupt: Drive attached character insane to cancel a card effect just triggered.

property.value: Attachment. Tome. Relic.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Search the top X cards of an opponent's deck. Chose and discard 1 of thse cards and return the rest in the same order. Then, remove Corruption of Enlightenment from the game.

card.name: ] The Dance of the Yellow King

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Until the end of the phase, each character whose ability is triggered goes insane, ignoring Willpower and @ icons.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: When a character committed to a story is made insane, choose a non-Ancient One character currently committed to the same story. That character goes insane, ignoring Willpower and @.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Each player may restore and ready any number of insane characters he controls. Then, each player chooses and discards a card from his hand for each non-Lunatic character he restored this way.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Reveal up to 3 cards at random from an opponent's hand. Then choose 1 and place it on top of its owners deck. Then if It is not Night remove Cassilda's Song from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose a story. Each character committed to that story goes insane, if able.

card.name: ] The Door That Will Not Close

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Characters cannot uncommit from this conspiracy unless they go insane.
 Action: Drive a character you control at this conspiracy insane. Any player may trigger this ability.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If it is night, each player must choose and discard a card from his hand in addition to the normal result of losing a struggle. Ignore this effect if a player has 1 or more ] characters committed or no characters committed to this conspiracy.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Night. It is Night. After Opening Day comes into play, destroy all Day cards.
 Response: After you succeed at this conspiracy, restore and ready a character. Any player may trigger this ability.

 Response: After The Supplicant is restored, ready it to choose and restore 1 character. That character gains Willpower until the end of the turn.

property.value: Master of the Arcane Arts

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
When you play the Archmage, Arcanis, lower the cost by 1 for each neutral resource attached to the domain drained to pay for him.
 Action: Sacrifice a support card to choose and remove a support card from the game with a cost equal to or lower then the card you sacrificed. Limit once per turn.

property.name: Subtypes
property.value: Sorcerer. Independent.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: When your opponent succeeds at a story unopposed, search your deck for a card and reveal it. Set it aside and shuffle your deck. Then, place the revealed card on top of your deck and remove Thaumaturgical Insight from the game.
